content:
respons-portico-integration.png
@Tim Abbott this is what I came up with, I actually noticed the message about an already pending pr but I had done some work already on it so completed it since it was a small change and a high priority issue too :sweat_smile:
If their are no changes needed, I will submit a pr.
There is already a discussion regarding this on the #feedback stream here - https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/stream/137-feedback/topic/Zulip.20Integration.20Docs.20on.20Mobile/near/708632
@Sameer Choubey actually my query was related to the design of the required page for the docs mobile view, so posted it here.
Thanks! I think we only need one "Airbrake", the second one, and we can make that one a bit bigger
I'm not sure we actually need a "back to list" button in the mobile UI -- you can just use your phone's back button for that.
